GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.4cd: yadi śabdāhavayaṃ jyotir āsaṃsārān na dīpyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.5cd: teṣām asaṃnidhāne 'pi na svayaṃ paśya naśyati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.6ab: gaur gauḥ kāmadughā samyak prayuktā smaryate budhaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.6cd: duṣprayuktā punār gotvaṃ prayoktuḥ saiva śaṃsati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.7ab: tad alpam api nopekṣyaṃ kāvye duṣṭaṃ kathaṃ cana &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.7cd: syād vapuḥ sundaram api śvitreṇaikena durbhagam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.9ab: ataḥ prajānāṃ (vl. padānāṃ) vyutpattim abhisaṃdhāya sūrayaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.10ab: taiḥ śarīraṃ ca kāvyānām alaṃkārāś ca darśitāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.11ab: padyaṃ gadyaṃ ca miśraṃ ca tat tridhaiva vyavasthitam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.11cd: padyaṃ catuṣpadī tac ca vṛttaṃ jātir iti dvidhā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.12cd: sā vidyā naur vivikṣūṇāṃ gambhīraṃ kāvyasāgaram // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.13ab: muktakaṃ kulakaṃ koṣaḥ saṃghāta iti tādṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.20ab: nyūnam apy atra yaiḥ kaiś cid aṅgaiḥ kāvyaṃ na duṣyati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.21ab: guṇataḥ prāg upanyasya nāyakaṃ tena vidviṣām &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.23cd: iti tasya prabhedau dvau tayor ākhyāyikā kila // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.25ab: api tv aniyamo dṛṣṭas tatrāpy anyair udīraṇāt &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.25cd: anyo vaktā svayaṃ veti kīdṛg vā bhedakāraṇam (vl. lakṣaṇam) // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.26ab: vaktraṃ cāparavaktraṃ ca socchvāsatvaṃ ca bhedakam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.26cd: cihnam ākhyāyikāyāś cet prasaṅgena kathāsv api // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.27cd: bhedaś ca dṛṣṭo lambhādir ucchvāso vastu kiṃ tataḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.30cd: mukham iṣṭāsrthasaṃsiddhau kiṃ hi na syāt kṛtātmanām // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.31cd: gadyapadyamayī kā cic campūr ity abhidhīyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.32ab: tad etad vāṅmayaṃ bhūyaḥ saṃskṛtaṃ prākṛtaṃ tathā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.32cd: apabhraṃśāś ca miśraṃ cety āhur āryāś caturvidhaṃ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.33ab: saṃskṛtaṃ nāma daivī vāg anvākhyātā maharṣibhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.35ab: śaurasenī ca gauḍī ca lāṭī cānyā ca tādṛśī &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.35cd: yāti prākṛtam ity evaṃ vyavahāreṣu saṃnidhim // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.38ab: kathā hi sarvabhāṣābhiḥ saṃskṛtena ca badhyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.39cd: śravyam eveti saiṣāpi dvayī gatir udāhṛtā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.40ab: asty aneko girāṃ mārgaḥ sūkṣmabhedaḥ parasparam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.42ab: iti vaidarbhamārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.51ab: madhuraṃ rasavad vāci vastuny api rasasthitiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.52ab: yayā kayā cic chrutyā yat samānam anubhūyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.53ab: eṣa rājā yadā lakṣmīṃ prāptavān brāhmaṇapriyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.54ab: itīdaṃ nādṛtaṃ gauḍair anuprāsas tu tatpriyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.54cd: anuprāsād api prāyo vaidarbhair idam īpsitam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.55ab: varṇāvṛttir anuprāsaḥ pādeṣu ca padeṣu ca &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.57ab: cāru cāndramasaṃ bhīru bimbaṃ paśyaitad ambare &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.59ab: smaraḥ kharaḥ khalaḥ kāntaḥ kāyaḥ kopaś ca naḥ kṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.59cd: cyuto mānodhiko rāgo moho jātosavo gatāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.62ab: kāmaṃ sarvo 'py alaṃkāro rasam arthe niṣiñcati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.63ab: kanye kāmayamānaṃ māṃ na tvaṃ kāmayase katham &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.66cd: duṣpratītikaraṃ grāmyaṃ yathā yā bhavataḥ priyā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.67ab: kharaṃ prahatya viśrāntaḥ puruṣo vīryavān iti &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.67cd: evamādi na śaṃsanti mārgayor ubhayor api // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.72ab: dīptam ity aparair bhūmnā kṛcchrodyam api badhyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.72cd: nyakṣeṇa kṣapitaḥ pakṣaḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kṣaṇād iti // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.75ab: nedṛśaṃ bahu manyatne mārgayor ubhayor api &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.76ab: utkarṣavān guṇaḥ kaś cid yasminn ukte pratīyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.77ab: arthiṇāṃ kṛpaṇā dṛṣṭis tvanmukhe patitā sakṛt &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.77cd: tadavasthā punar deva nānyasya mukham īkṣate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.78ab: iti tyāgasya vākye 'sminn utkarṣaḥ sādhu lakṣyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.79ab: ślāghyair viśeṣaṇair yuktam udāraṃ kaiś cid iṣyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.83cd: anye tv anākulaṃ hṛdyam icchanty ojo girāṃ yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.84cd: kasya kāmāturaṃ ceto vāruṇī na kariṣyati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.85cd: tac ca vārtābhidhāneṣu varṇanāsv api dṛśyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.86ab: gṛhāṇi nāma tāny eva taporāśir bhavādṛśaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.92ab: idam atyuktir ity uktam etad gauḍopalālitam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.92cd: prasthānaṃ prākpraṇītaṃ tu sāram anyasya vartmanaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.93cd: samyag ādhīyate yatra sa samādhiḥ smṛto yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.97ab: iti hṛdamahṛdyaṃ tu niṣṭhīvati vadhūr iti &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.97cd: yugapan naikadharmāṇām adhyāsaś ca smṛto yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.100ab: tad etat kāvyasarvasvaṃ samādhir nāma yo guṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.101cd: tadbhedās tu na śakyante vaktuṃ pratikavisthitāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.102cd: tathāpi na tad ākhyātuṃ sarasvatyāpi śakyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_1.103ab: naisargikī ca pratibhā śrutaṃ ca bahunirmalam &
GK16dkavy12u:207: na vidyate yady api pūrvavāsanāguṇānubandhi pratibhānam adbhutam &
GK16dkavy12u:208: śrutena yatnena ca vāgupāsitā dhruvaṃ karoty eva kam apy anugraham //
GK16dkavy12u:209: tadastatandrair aniśaṃ sarasvatī śramād upāsyā khalu kīrtim īpsubhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:210: kṛśe kavitve 'pi janāḥ kṛtaśramā vidagdhagoṣṭhīṣu vihartum īśate //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.1ab: ity ācāryadaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau kāvyādarśe mārgavibhāgo nāma prathamaḥ paricchedaḥ kāvyaśobhākārān dharmān alaṃkārān pracakṣate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.1cd: te cādyāpi vikalpyante kas tān kārtsnyena vakṣyati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.2ab: kiṃ tu bījaṃ vikalpānāṃ pūrvācāryaiḥ pradarśitam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.3ab: kāś cin mārgavibhāgārtham uktāḥ prāg apy alaṃkriyāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.8cd: svabhāvoktiś ca jātiś cetyādyā sālaṃkṛtir yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.11ab: badhnann aṅgeṣu romāñcaṃ kurvan manasi nirvṛtim &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.13cd: śāstreṣv asyaiva sāmrājyaṃ kāvyeṣv apy etad īpsitam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.16ab: rājīvam iva te vaktraṃ netre nīlotpale iva &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.18ab: tavānanam ivāmbhojam ambhojam iva te mukham &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.19ab: tvanmukhaṃ kamalenaiva tulyaṃ nānyena kena cit &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.20ab: padmaṃ tāvat tavānveti mukham anyac ca tādṛśam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.20cd: asti ced astu tatkārīty asāv aniyamopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.21ab: samuccayopamāpy asti na kāntyaiva mukhaṃ tava &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.22ab: tvayy eva tvanmukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dṛśyate divi candramāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.22cd: iyaty eva bhidā nānyety asāv atiśayopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.23ab: mayy evāsyā mukahśrīr ity alam indor vikatthanaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.23cd: padme 'pi sā yad asty evety asāv utprekṣitopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.24ab: yadi kiṃ cid bhavet padmaṃ subhru vibhrāntalocanam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.24cd: tat te mukhaśriyaṃ dhattām ity asāv adbhutopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.25cd: indum apy anudhāvāmīty eṣā mohopamā smṛtā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.26ab: kiṃ padmam antarbhrāntāli kiṃ te lolekṣaṇaṃ mukham &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.27cd: atas tvanmukham evedam ity asau nirṇayopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.28cd: ambhojam iva te vaktram iti śleṣopamā smṛtā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.30ab: padmaṃ bahurajaś candraḥ kṣayī tābhyāṃ tavānanam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.30cd: samānam api sotsekam iti nindopamā smṛtā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.32ab: candreṇa tvanmukhaṃ tulyam ity ācikhyāsu me manaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.32cd: sa guṇo vāstu doṣo vety ācikhyāsopamāṃ viduḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.34ab: na jātu śaktir indos te mukhena pratigarjitum &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.36ab: na padmaṃ mukham evedaṃ na bhṛṅgau cakṣuṣī ime &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.39ab: candrabimbād iva viṣaṃ candanād iva pāvakaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.39cd: paruṣā vāg ito vaktrād ity asaṃbhāvitopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.41cd: tava tanvaṅgi vadanam ity asau vikriyopamā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.42cd: vikramas tvayy adhāl lakṣmīm iti mālopamā matā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.45ab: nalinyā iva tanvaṅgyās tasyāḥ padmam ivānanam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.47cd: nanu dvitīyo nāsty eva pārijātasya pādapaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.48cd: yad bruvanti smṛtā seyaṃ tulyayogopamā yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.49ab: divo jagarti rakṣāyai pulomārir bhuvo bhavān &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.49cd: asurās tena hanyante sāvalepās tvayā nṛpāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.50ab: kāntyā candramasaṃ dhāmnā sūryaṃ dhairyeṇa cārṇavam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.51ab: na liṅgavacane bhinne na hīnādhikatāpi vā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.52ab: strīva gacchati ṣaṇḍho 'yaṃ vakty eṣā strī pumān iva &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.52cd: prāṇā iva priyo 'yaṃ me vidyā dhanam ivārjitā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.53cd: alam aṃśumataḥ kakṣām āroḍhuṃ tejasā nṛpah // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.54ab: ityevamādau saubhāgyaṃ na jahāty eva jātu cit &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.54cd: asty eva kva cid udvegaḥ prayoge vāgvidāṃ yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.55cd: bhartṛbhakto bhaṭaḥ śveva khadyoto bhāti bhānuvat // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.56ab: īdṛśaṃ varjyate sadbhiḥ kāraṇaṃ tatra cintyatāṃ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.63ab: tasya muṣṇāti saubhāgyaṃ tasya kāntiṃ vilumpati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.64ab: tatpadavyāṃ padaṃ dhatte tasya kakṣāṃ vigāhate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.64cd: tam anvety anubadhnāti tacchīlaṃ tan niṣedhati // //
GK16dkavy12u:340: upamāyām ime proktāḥ kavīnāṃ buddhisaukhyadāḥ //ity upamācakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.67cd: bāhū late vasantaśrīs tvaṃ naḥ pratyakṣacāriṇī // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.75cd: mukhena mugdhaḥ so 'py eṣa jano rāgamayaḥ krtaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.79cd: rūpakaṃ viṣamaṃ nāma lalitaṃ jāyate yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.83ab: na mīlayati padmāni na nabho 'py avagāhate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.84cd: atra saṃdarśyate yasmād viruddhaṃ nāma rūpakam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.85cd: kāmadatvāc ca lokānām asi tvaṃ kalpapādapaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.86cd: kalpadrumaś ca kriyate tad idaṃ heturūpakam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.91cd: na te sundari saṃvādīty etad ākṣeparūpakam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.92ab: mukhendur api te caṇḍi māṃ nirdahati nirdayam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.94ab: naitan mukham idaṃ padmaṃ ta netre bhramarāv imau &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.94cd: etāni kesarāṇy eva naitā dantārciṣas tava // //
GK16dkavy12u:402: diṅmātraṃ darśitaṃ dhīrair anuktam anumīyatām //iti rūpakacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.97cd: sarvavākyopakāraś cet tam āhur dīpakaṃ yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.98ab: pavano dakṣiṇaḥ pārṇaṃ jīrṇaṃ harati vīrudhām &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.101cd: kvāpi nītāḥ kuto 'py āsann ānītā devetarddhayaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.102cd: vākyayor darśayiṣyāmaḥ kāni cit tāni tad yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.104ab: mando gandhavahaḥ kṣāro vahnir induś ca jāyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.105cd: calaṃ ca taḍitāṃ dāma balaṃ kusumadhanvanaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.106cd: mayāpi maraṇe cetas trayam etat samaṃ kṛtam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.107ab: śuklaḥ śvetārciṣo vṛddhyai pakṣaḥ pañcaśarasya saḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.107cd: sa ca rāgasya rāgo 'pi yūnāṃ ratyutsavaśriyaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.111ab: haraty ābhogam āśānāṃ gṛhṇāti jyotiṣāṃ gaṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.111cd: ādatte cādya me prāṇān asau jaladharāvalī // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.113cd: divi bhramanti jīmūtā bhuvi caite mataṅgajāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.114ab: atra dharmair abhinnānām abhrāṇāṃ dantināṃ tathā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.117cd: unmīlanti ca kandalyo dalanti kakubhāni ca // //
GK16dkavy12u:447: jitvā viśvaṃ bhavān atra viharaty avarodhanaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:448: viharatv apsarobhis te ripuvargo divaṃ gataḥ //ity āvṛtticakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.122cd: pravṛttaiva yad ākṣiptā vṛttākṣepaḥ sa īdṛśaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.123cd: kim apāṅgam aparyāptam asmin karmaṇi manyase // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.124cd: karṇe kā cit priyeṇaivaṃ cāṭukāreṇa rudhyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.125ab: satyaṃ bravīmi na tvaṃ māṃ draṣṭuṃ vallabha lapsyase &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.126cd: kadācid aparādho 'sya bhāvīty evam arunddha yat // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.127ab: tava tanvaṅgi mithyaiva rūḍham aṅgeṣu mārdavam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.127cd: yadi satyaṃ mṛdūny eva kim akāṇḍe rujanti mām // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.129ab: sundarī sā na vety eṣa vivekaḥ kena jāyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.129cd: prabhāmātraṃ hi taralaṃ dṛśyate na tadāśrayaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.131cd: bhruvau ca bhugne na tathāpy aduṣṭasyāsti me bhayam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.132ab: sa eṣa kāraṇākṣepaḥ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhiyaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.133cd: dṛṣṭaś ca phullā niculā na mṛtā cāsmi kiṃ nv idam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.135ab: na ciraṃ mama tāpāya tava yātrā bhaviṣyati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.135cd: yadi yāsyasi yātavyam alam āśaṅkayātra te // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.137ab: dhanaṃ ca bahu labhyaṃ te sukhaṃ kṣemaṃ ca vartmani &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.137cd: na ca me prāṇasaṃdehas tathāpi priya mā sma gāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.139cd: gaccha tiṣṭha vā kānta svāvasthā tu niveditā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.141ab: gaccha gacchasi cet kānta panthānaḥ santu te śivāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.141cd: mamāpi janma tatraiva bhūyād yatra gato bhavān // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.143ab: yadi satyaiva yātrā te kāpy anyā mṛgyatāṃ tvayā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.145ab: gantā ced gaccha tūrṇaṃ te karṇau yānti purā ravāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.147cd: nirgacchati mukhād vāṇī mā gā iti karomi kim // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.149cd: premṇaḥ prayāṇaṃ tvaṃ brūhi mayā tasyeṣṭam iṣyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.151ab: sahiṣye virahaṃ nātha dehy adṛśyāñjanaṃ mama &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.151cd: yad aktanetrāṃ kandarpaḥ prahartā māṃ na paśyati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.152cd: patyuḥ prasthānam ity āhur upāyākṣepam īdṛśam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.153ab: pravṛttaiva prayāmīti vāṇī vallabha te mukhāt &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.155cd: buddhvā vakti priyaṃ dṛṣṭvā kiṃ cireṇāgato bhavān // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.156cd: kāntasya kātarākṣyā yan mūrchākṣepa sa īdṛśaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.157ab: nāghrātaṃ na kṛtaṃ karṇe strībhir madhuni nārpitam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.159cd: mukhendau tava satyasminn apareṇa kim indunā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.161ab: artho na saṃbhṛtaḥ kaś cin na vidyā kā cid arcitā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.161cd: na tapaḥ saṃcintaṃ kiṃ cid gataṃ ca sakalaṃ vayaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.163ab: kim ayaṃ śaradambhodaḥ kiṃ vā haṃsakadambakam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.163cd: rutaṃ nūpurasaṃvādi śrūyate tan na toyadaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.164ab: ity ayaṃ saṃśayākṣepaḥ saṃśayo yan nivartyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.165ab: citram ākrāntaviśvo 'pi vikramas te na tṛpyati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.165cd: kadā vā dṛśyate tṛptir udīrṇasya havir bhujaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.167ab: na stūyase narendra tvaṃ dadāsīti kadā cana &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.167cd: svam eva matvā gṛhṇanti yatas tvad dhanam arthinaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:546: anenaiva diśānye 'pi vikalpāḥ śakyam ūhitum // ity ākṣepacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.169ab: jñeyah so 'rthāntaranyāso vastu prastutya kiṃ cana &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.172cd: paśya gacchata evāstaṃ niyatiḥ kena laṅghyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.176cd: kaṭur bhavati karṇasya kāmināṃ pāpam īdṛśam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.178ab: kṣiṇotu kāmaṃ śītāṃśuḥ kiṃ vasanto dunoti mām &
GK16dkavy12u:567: kumudāny api dāhāya kim ayaṃ kamalākaraḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.180ab: śabdopātte prātīte vā sādṛśye vastunor dvayoḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.180cd: tatra yad bhedakathanaṃ vyatirekaḥ sa kathyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.181cd: guṇais tulyo 'si bhedas tu vapuṣaivedṛśena te // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.184cd: kārṣṇyaṃ piśaṅgatā cobhau yat pṛthag darśitāv iha // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.185ab: tvaṃ samudraś ca durvārau mahāsattvau satejasau &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.185cd: ayaṃ tu yuvayor bhedaḥ sa jaḍātmā paṭur bhavān // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.186ab: sa eṣa śleṣarūpatvāt saśleṣa iti gṛhyatām &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.186cd: sākṣepaś ca sahetuś ca darśyate tad api dvayam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.187ab: sthitimān api dhīro 'pi ratnānām ākaro 'pi san &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.187cd: tava kakṣāṃ na yāty eva malino makarālayaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.190ab: tvanmukhaṃ kamalaṃ ceti dvayor apy anayor bhidā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.193cd: bhramadbhramaram ambhojaṃ lolanetraṃ mukhaṃ tu te // //
GK16dkavy12u:607: dṛṣṭirodhitayā tulyaṃ bhinnam anyair adarśi tat //iti vyatirekacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.199cd: yatra svābhāvikatvaṃ vā vibhāvyaṃ sā vibhāvanā // //
GK16dkavy12u:619: uktaṃ ca surabhitvādi phalaṃ tat sā vibhāvanā //iti vibhāvanācakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.207cd: kasyāṃ cid iha bālāyām icchāvṛttir vibhāvyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.210cd: socchrayaḥ sthairyavān daivād eṣa labdho mayā drumaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.211cd: sarve sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ pūrvatrānyatra tu dvayam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.217ab: stanayor jaghanasyāpi madhye madhyaṃ priye tava &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.217cd: asti nāstīti saṃdeho na me 'dyāpi nivartate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.218ab: nirṇetuṃ śakyam astīti madhyaṃ tava nitambini &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.219cd: māti mātum aśakyo 'pi yaśorāśir yad atra te // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.221cd: anyathotprekṣyate yatra tām utprekṣāṃ vidur yathā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.223ab: snātuṃ pātuṃ bisāny attuṃ kariṇo jalagāhanam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.224cd: iti karṇotpalaṃ prāyas tava dṛṣṭyā vilaṅghyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.225cd: spṛśyate vā na vety evaṃ kavinotprekṣya varṇyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.228cd: limpates tamasaś cāsau dharmaḥ ko 'tra samīkṣyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.229ab: yadi lepanam eveṣṭaṃ limpatir nāma ko 'paraḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.229cd: sa eva dharmo dharmī cety anunmatto na bhāṣate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.230ab: kartā yady upamānaṃ syān nyagbhūto 'sau kriyāpade &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.231ab: yo limpaty amunā tulyaṃ tama ity api śaṃsataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.231cd: aṅgānīti na saṃbaddhaṃ so 'pi mṛgyaḥ samo guṇaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.232ab: yathendur iva te vaktram iti kāntiḥ pratīyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.232cd: na tathā limpater lepād anyad atra pratīyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:678: manye śaṅke dhruvaṃ prāyo nūnam ityevamādibhiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:679: utprekṣā vyajyate śabdair ivaśabdo 'pi tādṛśaḥ // ity utprekṣācakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.235ab: hetuś ca sūkṣmaleśau ca vācām uttamabhūṣaṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.240ab: nivartye ca vikārye ca hetutvaṃ tadapekṣayā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.240cd: prāpye tu karmaṇi prāyaḥ kriyāpekṣaiva hetutā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.242cd: candraḥ pūrṇaś ca kāmena pānthadṛṣṭer viṣaṃ kṛtam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.244ab: gato 'stam arko bhātīndur yānti vāsāya pakṣiṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.245cd: dehoṣmabhiḥ subodhaṃ te sakhi kāmāturaṃ manaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.248cd: kṣato mohaś cyutā tṛṣṇā kṛtaṃ puṇyāśrame manaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.249ab: vanāny amūni na gṛhāṇy etā nadyo na yoṣitaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.249cd: mṛgā ime na dāyādās tan me nandati mānasam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.255cd: muktaṃ tad anyatas tena so 'py ahaṃ manasi kṣataḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.260ab: iti hetuvikalpānāṃ darśitā gatir īdṛśī // iti hetucakram// &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.261ab: kadā nau saṃgamo bhāvīty ākīrṇe vaktum akṣamam &
GK16dkavy12u:739: anullaṅhgyaiva sūkṣmatvam abhūd atra vyavasthitaḥ //iti sūkṣmacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.266cd: avagaccheyur ā jñātam aho śītānilaṃ vanam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.267ab: ānandāśru pravṛttaṃ me kathaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva kanyakām &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.268cd: leśam eke vidur nindāṃ stutiṃ vā leśataḥ kṛtām // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.269ab: yuvaiṣa guṇavān rājā yogyas te patir ūrjitaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.269cd: raṇotsave manaḥ saktaṃ yasya kāmotsavād api // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.271ab: capalo nirdayaś cāsau janaḥ kiṃ tena me sakhi &
GK16dkavy12u:755: mānaṃ sakhijanoddiṣṭaṃ kartuṃ rāgād aśaktayā // iti leśacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.273cd: yathāsaṃkhyam iti proktaṃ saṃkhyānaṃ krama ity api // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.275cd: ūrjasvi rūḍhāhaṃkāraṃ yuktotkarṣaṃ ca tat trayam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.276ab: adya yā mama govinda jātā tvayi gṛhāgate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.277ab: ity āha yuktaṃ viduro nānyatas tādṛśī dhṛtiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.278ab: somaḥ sūryo marudbhūmir vyoma hotānalo jalam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.278cd: iti rūpāṇy atikramya tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ deva ke vayam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.279ab: iti sākṣātkṛte deve rājño yad rātavarmaṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.279cd: prītiprakāśanaṃ tac ca preya ity avagamyatām // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.280ab: mṛte 'ti pretya saṃgantuṃ yayā me maraṇaṃ matam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.280cd: saivāvantī mayā labdhā katham atraiva janmani // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.281ab: prāk prītir darśitā seyaṃ ratiḥ śṛṅgāratāṃ gatā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.282ab: nigṛhya keśeṣv ākṛṣṭā kṛṣṇā yenāgrato mama &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.282cd: so 'yaṃ duḥśāsanaḥ pāpo labdhaḥ kiṃ jīvati kṣaṇam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.283ab: ity āruhya parāṃ koṭiṃ krodho raudrātmatāṃ gataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.283cd: bhīmasya paśyataḥ śatrum ity etad rasavadvacaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.284ab: ajitvā sārṇavām urvīm aniṣṭvā vividhair makhaiḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.284cd: adatvā cārtham arthibhyo bhaveyaḥ pārthivaḥ katham // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.290cd: śākhāś ca mandirāṇy eṣāṃ citraṃ nandanaśākhinām // //
GK16dkavy12u:795: iha tv aṣṭarasāyattā rasavattā smṛtā girām //iti rasavaccakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.293ab: apakartāham asmīti hṛdi te mā sma bhūd bhayam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.293cd: vimukheṣu na me khaḍgaḥ prahartuṃ jātu vāñchati // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.294ab: iti muktaḥ paro yuddhe niruddho darpaśalinā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.294cd: puṃsā kenāpi taj jñeyam ūrjasvītyevamādikam //ity ūrjasvi// // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.295ab: artham iṣṭam anākhyāya sākṣāt tasyaiva siddhaye &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.296cd: tam ahaṃ vārayiṣyāmi yuvābhyāṃ svairam āsyatām // //
GK16dkavy12u:805: nirvartayitum icchantyā kayāpy apasṛtaṃ tataḥ //iti paryāyoktam// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.299ab: mānam asyā nirākartuṃ pādayor me patiṣyataḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.299cd: upakārāya diṣṭyaitad udīrṇaṃ ghanagarjitam // iti samāhitam// // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.300ab: āśayasya vibhūter vā yan mahatvam anuttamam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.300cd: udāttaṃ nāma taṃ prāhur alaṃkāraṃ manīṣibhiḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.301ab: guroḥ śasanam atyetuṃ na śaśāka sa rāghavaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:817: suvyañjitam iti proktaṃ udāttadvayam apy adaḥ // ity udāttam// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.304cd: na pañceṣu smaras tasya sahasraṃ patriṇām iti // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.305ab: candanaṃ candrikā mando gandhavāhaś ca dakṣiṇaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.305cd: seyam agnimayī sṛṣṭir mayi śītā parān prati // //
GK16dkavy12u:829: ity apahnutibhedānāṃ lakṣyo lakṣyeṣu vistaraḥ //ity apahanutiḥ// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.311cd: rājā harati lokasya hṛdayaṃ mṛdubhiḥ karaiḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.312cd: rājñā pradoṣo mām ittham apriyaṃ kiṃ na bādhate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.313cd: prāg eva darśitāḥ śleṣā darśyante ke canāpare // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.314cd: viruddhakarmā cāsty anyaḥ śleṣo niyamavān api // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.316cd: dṛśo dūtyaś ca karṣanti kāntābhiḥ preṣitāḥ priyān // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.319ab: nistriṃśatvam asāv eva dhanuṣy evāsya vakratā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.319cd: śareṣv eva narendrasya mārgaṇatvaṃ ca vartate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.320ab: padmānām eva daṇḍeṣu kaṇṭakas tvayi rakṣati &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.321cd: dakṣaḥ prajāpatiś cāsīt svāmī śaktidharaś ca saḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:855: devo 'py avibudho jajñe śaṃkaro 'py abhujaṅgavān //iti śleṣacakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.324ab: na kaṭhoraṃ na vā tīkṣṇam āyudhaṃ puṣpadhanvanaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.325cd: tathāpy eṣā tapobhaṅgaṃ vidhātuṃ vedhaso 'py alam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.326ab: na baddhā bhrūkuṭir nāpi sphurito daśanacchadaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.326cd: na ca raktābhavad dṛṣṭir jitaṃ ca dviṣatāṃ kulam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.327ab: na rathā na ca mātaṅgā na hayā na ca pattayaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.328ab: ekacakro ratho yantā vikalo viṣamā hayāḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.328cd: ākrāmaty eva tejasvī tathāpy arko nabhastalam // //
GK16dkavy12u:869: ayam eva kramo 'nyeṣāṃ bhedānām api kalpane//iti viśeṣokticakram// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.331ab: yamaḥ kubero varuṇaḥ sahasrākṣo bhavān api &
GK16dkavy12u:875: kṣaṇadvayaṃ na tiṣṭhanti ghanārabdhāny api svayam //iti tulyayogitā// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.335cd: rāgeṇa punar ākrāntaṃ jāyate jagatāṃ manaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.336cd: natanābhi vapuḥ strīṇāṃ kaṃ na haraty unnatastanam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.337cd: api te rūpam asmākaṃ tanvi tāpāya kalpate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.343ab: yadi nindann iva stauti vyājastutir asau smrtā &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.343cd: doṣābhāsā guṇā eva labhante hy atra saṃnidhim // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.344cd: tvayā rājñāpi saiveyaṃ jitā mā bhūn madas tava // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.345ab: puṃsaḥ purāṇād ācchidya śrīs tvayā paribhujyate &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.345cd: rājann ikṣākuvaṃśasya kim idaṃ tava yujyate // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.346cd: ahaṅkāraḥ parāṃ koṭim ārohati kutas tava // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.348cd: sad asad vā nidarśyeta yadi tat syān nidarśanam // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.349ab: udayann eṣa savitā padmeṣv arpayati śriyam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.351cd: arthānāṃ yo vinimayaḥ parivṛttis tu sā smṛtā // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.352ab: saha dīrghā mama śvāsair imāḥ samprati rātrayaḥ &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.352cd: pāṇḍurāś ca mamaivāṅgeḥ saha tāś candrabhūṣaṇāh // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.353cd: patanti ca samaṃ teṣām asubhir malayānilāḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.355ab: ity udāhṛtayo dattāḥ sahokter atra kāś cana //iti sahoktiḥ// &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.355cd: kriyate parivṛtteś ca kiṃ cid rūpanidarśanam // //
GK16dkavy12u:923: cirārjitaṃ hṛtaṃ teṣāṃ yaśaḥ kumudapāṇḍuram //iti parivṛttiḥ// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.357cd: pātu vaḥ paramaṃ jyotir avāṅmanasagocaram //ity āśīḥ// // //
GK16dkavy12u:936: śleṣaḥ sarvāsu puṣṇāti prāyo vakroktiṣu śriyam &
GK16dkavy12u:937: bhinnaṃ dvidhā svabhāvoktir vakroktiś ceti vāṅmayam //iti saṃsṛṣtiḥ// //
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.364ab: tad bhāvikam iti prāhuḥ prabandhaviṣayaṃ guṇam &
GK16dkavy12u:dkd_2.364cd: bhāvaḥ kaver abhiprāyaḥ kāvyeṣv āsiddhi saṃsthitaḥ // //
GK16dkavy12u:943: bhāvāyattām idaṃ sarvam iti tad bhāvikaṃ viduḥ //iti bhāvikam// //
GK16dkavy12u:946: panthāḥ sa eṣa vivṛtaḥ parimāṇavṛttyā saṃhṛtya vistaram anantam alaṅkriyāṇām &
GK16dkavy12u:947: vācām atītya viṣayaṃ parivartamānān abhyāsa eva vivarītum alaṃ viśeṣān //
GK16dkavy12u:948: ity ācāryadaṇḍinaḥ kṛtau kāvyādarśe 'rthālaṅkāravibhāgo nāma dvitīyo paricchedaḥ //
